abandonment_avoidance.description: Avoids emotional or physical abandonment; seeks stability and reassurance.
abandonment_avoidance.activation: Triggered by rejection cues, distance, emotional withdrawal.

betrayal_prevention.description: Attempts to anticipate deception or manipulation; seeks certainty.

control_seeking.description: Attempts to stabilize environment to offset internal fear.
control_seeking.activation: Triggered by chaos, uncertainty, rapid change.

security_restoration.description: Seeks emotional or physical safety when overwhelmed.
security_restoration.activation: Triggered by high threat load or overstimulation.
